property.name: traf.node.dir
property.description: List of directories (comma seperated) for trafodion scratch space

property.name: traf.log.dir
property.description: Directory path where log files are created

property.name: traf.var.dir
property.description: Directory path where small generated files are stored

property.name: traf.ldap.enabled
property.description: Enable Trafodion user authentication via LDAP

property.name: traf.ldap.port
property.description: LDAP server(s) port number (Example: 389 for no encryption or TLS, 636 for SSL)

property.name: traf.ldap.encrypt
property.description: LDAP encryption level must match LDAP server(s)

property.name: traf.ldap.certpath
property.description: File path of SSL/TLS certificate file (*.pem)

property.name: traf.ldap.user
property.description: User name for LDAP search (if required by LDAP server)

property.name: traf.ldap.pwd
property.description: Password for LDAP search (if required by LDAP server)

property.name: content
ldap_content
